TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division B Regional 7
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.343.cipherString: Let us attend to the present, and as to the future we shall know how to manage when the occasion arrives.
CIPHER.343.question: A quote from CORNEILLE has been encoded as an Aristocrat, what does it say? When you have solved it, raise your hand so that the time can be recorded and the solution checked.

CIPHER.357.cipherString: You rush a miracle worker, you get lousy miracles!
CIPHER.357.question: A quote by Jim Butcher has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 9=●×, 3=–●, 1=×●, 7=–×, 4=×–, 2=●●

CIPHER.362.cipherString: Success is not to discover what others like, it is to acquire and practise the skills that help one gain their love.
CIPHER.362.question: Solve this quote from Muhammad Adb Al-Rahman Al-Arifi which has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.366.cipherString: The most dangerous thing in the world is to try to leap a chasm in two jumps.
CIPHER.366.question: A quote by William Lloyd George has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 3 and 5 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.352.cipherString: You have to know the past to understand the present.
CIPHER.352.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Carl Sagan using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text ends with SENT

CIPHER.346.cipherString: The way to wealth is as plain as the road to market. It depends chiefly on two words, industry and frugality.
CIPHER.346.question: Decode a quote by FRANKLIN that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K1 alphabet. You are told that it contains the word WEALTH.

CIPHER.364.cipherString: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up.
CIPHER.364.question: Encode this quote by A. A. Milne using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.367.cipherString: Speak when you are angry, and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
CIPHER.367.question: A quote by Lawrence Peter has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 3 and 5 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.345.cipherString: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
CIPHER.345.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by George Bernard Shaw which has the word ONLY mapped to LPME.

CIPHER.355.cipherString: You don't notice the air until someone spoils it.
CIPHER.355.question: A quote has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 6=×, 0=●, 3=–, 5=×, 2=×, 7=●

CIPHER.354.cipherString: Mother Nature doesn't care if you're having fun.
CIPHER.354.question: A quote by Larry Niven has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 5=●, 7=–, 3=×, 2=–, 9=×

CIPHER.361.cipherString: Life is going to give you just what you put in it. Put your whole heart in everything you do, and pray, then you can wait.
CIPHER.361.question: Solve this quote from Maya Angelou which has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.350.cipherString: How far you will go is defined by your attitude and enthusiasm.
CIPHER.350.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Debasish Mridha using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.365.cipherString: Once I get on a puzzle, I can't get off.
CIPHER.365.question: The following quote by Richard Feynman needs to be encoded with the Affine Cipher using a=7 and b=9.

CIPHER.359.question: After solving the cryptarithm MEMOIR+PAPER=LIBRARY decode the phrase 765184 5732169.

CIPHER.356.cipherString: As long as one keeps searching, the answers come.
CIPHER.356.question: A quote by Joan Baez has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 4=●×, 3=×●, 7=–×, 2=–●, 5=×–

CIPHER.363.cipherString: You have succeeded in life when all you really WANT is only what you really NEED.
CIPHER.363.question: Solve this quote from Vernon Howard which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.347.cipherString: You are today where your thoughts have brought you; you will be tomorrow where your thoughts take you.
CIPHER.347.question: Decode a quote by James Allen that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K2 alphabet. You are told that it contains the word BROUGHT.

CIPHER.351.cipherString: The spirit of a man is constructed out of his choices.
CIPHER.351.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Irvin D. Yalom using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.358.cipherString: Go as far as you can see and you will see further.
CIPHER.358.question: A quote by Zig Ziglar has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with GO AS FAR.

CIPHER.349.cipherString: Happiness is standalone element. It's not connected to anything. Least of all to power, wealth, fame or material objects.
CIPHER.349.question: A famous phrase from Rahul Shrivastava has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet. You are told that XLISF maps to WEALT.

CIPHER.353.cipherString: Los franceses dicen que tiene hambre cuando comes y yo me inspiro cuando trabajo. es mi motor
CIPHER.353.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Karl Lagerfeld into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  You are told that HQFDT maps to COMES.
CIPHER.353.translation: The French say you get hungry when you're eating, and I get inspired when I'm working. It's my engine

CIPHER.344.cipherString: What I love about science is that as you learn, you don't really get answers. You just get better questions.
CIPHER.344.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by John Green which has the word GET occurs twice.

CIPHER.348.cipherString: Eye feal very adventuruos.  Their are sew many doors to be opended, and I'm not afriad to look behidn them.
CIPHER.348.question: Your friend offered you some advice in the form of a Cryptogram, but they are a terrible speller.  You are told it contains the word THEIR.

CIPHER.360.cipherString: I don't regret the painful times; I bare my scars as if they were medals.
CIPHER.360.question: The following quote by Paolo Coelho needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of SPEAK.
